title: Low Priority Queue
body: okay, i got another leaverbuster because my client disconnected but i've grown to accept it. After i waited the 20 minutes, i was gonna type something in chat, someone dodged mid-type and after another "found a match" thing showed up it automatically declined and stopped me from finding a match, then i had to wait 20 more minutes because of this. The Leaver Buster system doesn't even feel like a punishment, it just frustrates the player. Please fix the auto decline bug or just remove Leaver Buster entirely.{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

replies.body: The person who dodged wasn't in your premade at all? What you experienced shouldn't have happened if you were alone. Does this happen often or did this only happen once?
